statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); branch=$(cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf "\033[2m%s @ %s [%s]\033[0m" "$(basename "$dir")" "$model" "$branch"; else printf "\033[2m%s @ %s\033[0m" "$(basename "$dir")" "$model"; fi
